messages.name: Rajesh Kumar
messages.subject: Web Development Project Inquiry
messages.message: Hi Deepak, I came across your portfolio and I'm impressed with your work. We have a project requirement for a custom e-commerce platform. Would you be available for a discussion this week?

messages.name: Priya Sharma
messages.subject: FastAPI Development Opportunity
messages.message: Hello Deepak, we're a startup looking for a Python developer to build our MVP. Your FastAPI expertise seems like a perfect fit. Could we schedule a call to discuss the project details and timeline?

messages.name: Michael Johnson
messages.subject: Collaboration Proposal
messages.message: Hi there! I'm a UI/UX designer and I've been following your work. I'd love to collaborate on some projects. Your backend expertise combined with my frontend skills could create amazing applications.

messages.name: Anita Verma
messages.subject: Training Workshop Inquiry
messages.message: Dear Deepak, we are organizing a Python and FastAPI training workshop for our development team. Would you be interested in conducting a 2-day intensive workshop? Please let me know your availability and rates.

messages.name: David Chen
messages.subject: Remote Development Position
messages.message: Hello Deepak, we have an exciting remote opportunity for a Senior Python Developer position. Your portfolio demonstrates exactly the skills we're looking for. Are you open to remote work opportunities?

messages.name: Sarah Williams
messages.subject: API Integration Project
messages.message: Hi Deepak, we need help integrating multiple third-party APIs into our existing application. Your experience with FastAPI and API development makes you an ideal candidate. When would be a good time to discuss the project scope?
